Line 7: Line 7:
STUX is a bootable CD with a collection of software, automatic hardware detection, and support for many graphics cards, sound cards, SCSI and USB devices and other peripherals.
STUX is a bootable CD with a collection of software, automatic hardware detection, and support for many graphics cards, sound cards, SCSI and USB devices and other peripherals.
â
STUX also contains an installation wizard on the LiveCD for putting the distro on a [[pen drive]] and thereby booting from it. However, a 1GB pen drive is required to do this which is far larger than other USB Linux distributions.
+
STUX also contains an installation wizard on the Live CD for putting the distro on a [[pen drive]] and thereby booting from it. However, a 1GB pen drive is required to do this which is far larger than other USB Linux distributions.
